BasicObjectModel.title: Basic Object
BasicObjectModel.description: A basic JSON object with key value pairs

isTruncated.description: A flag that indicates whether Amazon S3 returned all of the results that satisfied the search criteria. If your results were truncated, you can make a follow-up paginated request by using the nextKeyMarker nextVersionIdMarker response parameters as a starting place in another request to return the rest of the results.

versionIdMarker.description: Marks the last version of the key returned in a truncated response.

nextKeyMarker.description: When the number of responses exceeds the value of maxKeys, nextKeyMarker specifies the first key not returned that satisfies the search criteria. Use this value for the ?keyMarker request parameter in a subsequent request.

maxKeys.description: The maximum number of results returned in a single response.

versions.description: The history of changes for the schema

isLatest.description: Whether or not this is the latest version of the schema

author.description: The ID of the user or application that created this version of the schema

lastModified.description: The UTC timestamp representing the last time the schema was updated

nextVersionIdMarker.description: When the number of responses exceeds the value of maxKeys, nextVersionIdMarker specifies the first object version not returned that satisfies the search criteria. Use this value for the ?versionIdMarker request parameter in a subsequent request.

deploymentTime.description: The UTC timestamp representing the last time the server was updated

isTruncated.description: A flag that indicates whether Amazon S3 returned all of the results that satisfied the search criteria. If your results were truncated, you can make a follow-up paginated request by using the nextKeyMarker nextVersionIdMarker response parameters as a starting place in another request to return the rest of the results.

versionIdMarker.description: Marks the last version of the key returned in a truncated response.

nextKeyMarker.description: When the number of responses exceeds the value of maxKeys, nextKeyMarker specifies the first key not returned that satisfies the search criteria. Use this value for the ?keyMarker request parameter in a subsequent request.

maxKeys.description: The maximum number of results returned in a single response.

versions.description: The history of changes for the data item

versionId.description: The version of the data item

deleted.description: Whether or not this version of the data item was the result of a delete operation

isLatest.description: Whether or not this is the latest version of the data item

author.description: The ID of the user or application that created this version of the data item

lastModified.description: The UTC timestamp representing the last time the data item was updated

deleteMarker.description: Whether or not this version of the data item is a delete marker

nextVersionIdMarker.description: When the number of responses exceeds the value of maxKeys, nextVersionIdMarker specifies the first object version not returned that satisfies the search criteria. Use this value for the ?versionIdMarker request parameter in a subsequent request.

DataItemListModel.title: List Data Items

itemId.description: The ID of the data item

item.description: The data item conforming to the schema

createdAt.description: The UTC timestamp representing the time the data item was created

schemaRef.description: The history ref of the schema that the data item belongs to

createdBy.description: The principal ID of the user or application that created the data item

modifiedAt.description: The UTC timestamp representing the last time the data item was updated

modifiedBy.description: The principal ID of the user or application that last modified the data item

schemaId.description: The ID of the schema that the data item belongs to

continuationToken.description: The pagination token for the next set of results; send back as ?continuationToken to continue the list

DataItemListModel.description: Either a list of data item IDs, or a list of data items if ?returnItems=true
